question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the side power doors. At the current location, if the side electric door is not within your field of view, what is the most relevant object in your field of view and where is this object?  
choose:  
A. The side electric door is within my field of view.  
B. The side electric door cannot be seen in my field of view, but there is a bus stop in the lower right corner of my field of view.  
C. The side electric door cannot be seen in my field of view, but there is a multi-story building on the right side of my field of view.  
D. The side electric door cannot be seen, but there is the main entrance of a high-rise building on the left side of my field of view.  
E. The side electric door cannot be seen in my field of view, but there is a road intersection in the middle of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The side electric door is not within the field of view, but there is a bus stop visible in the lower right corner of the field of view. This can be inferred from the presence of a bus stop shelter and its typical location along the roadside.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 23)]
Option: B
Reason: At the initial position, the side electric door is not within the field of view. A bus stop is visible in the lower left corner of the field of view.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The side electric door is not within the field of view, but there is a bus stop visible in the lower right corner of the field of view. This can be inferred from the presence of a bus stop shelter and its typical location along the roadside.
